description:
the expected behavior is that the status code in the request is 200.
                Additionally, the remark information in the request body should be confirmed as "success"

steps.name: Given  The API user sets "/api/withdrawal/reject/{{id}}" path parameters
When  The API user sends POST request to api withdrawal reject endpoint with valid authorization information
